1.  In the past 12 months, how many sickle cell pain attacks (crises) did you have?

derived_variable_level_data.values: 0=I did not have a pain attack (crisis) in the past 12 months|1=1|2=2|3=3|4=4 or more

variable.variable_description: 5.  About how long did your most recent pain attack (crisis) last?

derived_variable_level_data.values: 0=I've never had a pain attack (crisis)|1=Less than 1 hour|2=1-12 hours|3=13-23 hours|4=1-3 days|5=4-6 days|6=1-2 weeks|7=More than 2 weeks

variable.variable_description: 2.  When was your last pain attack (crisis)?

derived_variable_level_data.values: 0=I've never had a pain attack (crisis)|1=More than 5 years ago|2=1-5 years ago|3=7-11 months ago|4=1-6 months ago|5=1-3 weeks ago|6=Less than a week ago|7=I have one right now

variable.variable_description: 4.  How much did your last pain attack (crisis) interfere with your life?

derived_variable_level_data.values: 0=I've never had a pain attack (crisis)|1=Not at all=I did everything I usually do|2=I had to cut down on some things I usually do|3=I could not do most things I usually do|4=I could not take care of myself and needed some help from family or friends|5=I could not take care of myself and needed constant care from family,friends,doctors,or nurses

variable.variable_description: Alloimmunized during the baseline period or year:

derived_variable_level_data.values: 1=Yes, alloimmunization was first diagnosed during this period|11=Yes, but patient was diagnosed with alloimmunization during a previous period|0=No
derived_variable_level_data.field_note: Search Note: "antibod", "transfusion rxn".  Look at "Type and Screen" labs for a positive antibody, and note that <span style="font-style:italic">anyAntibody ID lab generally indicates a known alloimmunization.

variable.variable_description: AVN during the baseline period or year:

derived_variable_level_data.values: 1=Yes, avn was diagnosed for the first time during this period|11=Yes, but patient was diagnosed with avn in a previous period|0=No
derived_variable_level_data.field_note: Avascular necrosis.  Once a patient is diagnosed with AVN, all subsequent years should be marked "Yes."  Search Note: "necrosis", "avn" ***Note: Check Imaging Tab

variable.variable_description:
DM during the baseline period or year:
Includes both Type I and Type II Diabetes, but not gestational diabetes

derived_variable_level_data.values: 1=Yes, diabetes was diagnosed for the first time during this period|11=Yes, but patient was diagnosed with diabetes in a previous period|0=No
derived_variable_level_data.field_note: Diabetes Mellitus (Types I or II).  Search Note: "diab", "DM", "glucose" ***Note: Not the same as gestational diabetes

variable.variable_description: Retinopathy during the baseline period or year:

derived_variable_level_data.values: 1=Yes, retinopathy was diagnosed for the first time during this period|11=Yes, but patient was diagnosed with retinopathy in a previous period|0=No|99=Unknown (No ophthalmology exam during this period)
derived_variable_level_data.field_note: Search Note: "retinop". "Unknown" if no visit with ophthalmologist
